title: Master Your Drone Camera in MSFS with Stream Deck! üöÅ‚ú® | Step-by-Step Configuration Guide
description:
Unlock the full potential of your Microsoft Flight Simulator (MSFS) experience by learning how to control the drone camera using your Stream Deck! üöÄ In this comprehensive step-by-step guide, we'll walk you through the entire configuration process, ensuring you achieve seamless drone camera control. Whether you're a seasoned pilot or new to the flight sim community, this tutorial will elevate your gameplay to new heights. Don't miss out on this essential guide to mastering your drone camera setup! üéÆ‚úàÔ∏è

00:00 - Intro
00:20 - Intro video
00:28 - Where to find the key bindings for the drone camera
01:42 - Creating a new profile
02:42 - Adding new icon set
03:04 - Using the new icon set and adding sets
04:36 - Adding the drone configuration
12:16 - Outro

‚å®Ô∏è Keys used: 

- drone: shift + X
- follow: 5
- lock: 6
- up: E
- down: Q
- zoom in: shift + O
- zoom out: shift + U
- top view: F
- reset: R
- left: A
- forward: W
- backward: S
- right: D
- yaw left: left arrow
- yaw up: up arrow
- yaw down: down arrow
- yaw right: right arrow
- pitch left: U
- pitch forward: I
- pitch backward: K
- pitch right: O
- pitch reset: shift + space
- increase rotation speed: shift + R
- decrease rotation speed: shift + F
- increase drone speed: shift + T
- decrease drone speed: shift + G
